rows.label: tlk70000041_10_msg0001
rows.name:
Thanks to you, we were able to
successfully send food to the militia!

rows.label: tlk70000041_10_msg0002
rows.name:
You guys are really something, y'know?
You're not even soldiers, but you work
so hard for other people!

rows.label: tlk70000041_10_msg0003
rows.name:
Before I met you guys, all I ever
thought about was how to get out of
doing work...

rows.label: tlk70000041_10_msg0004
rows.name:
But if the work you do helps make
other people happy, maybe work isn't
so bad after all?

rows.label: tlk70000041_10_msg0005
rows.name:
From now on, I'm gonna be a new man!
I'm gonna work hard! Yeah! Though it
does sound like an awful lotta effort...

rows.label: tlk70000041_10_msg0006
rows.name:
On second thought, I take it back!
Forget what I just said about working
hard, yeah?
